topic.title: ACCESSIBLE INFORMATION PROFESSIONAL REQUIRED CODE (SNOMED CT)
topic.shortdesc: ACCESSIBLE INFORMATION PROFESSIONAL REQUIRED CODE (SNOMED CT) is the SNOMED CT® concept ID which is used to identify that the PATIENT requires support from a communication professional.
